com.hortonworks.registries.tag.service

Class TagCatalogResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hortonworks.registries.tag.service.TagCatalogResource

  • @Path(value="/v1/catalog")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class TagCatalogResource
extends Object
    REST resource for managing hierarchical tags in a system.

    Note: The JAVADOCS should be updated whenever there are any changes to the api.

    • Method Detail

      • listTags

        @GET
 @Path(value="/tags")
 @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response listTags(@Context
                                                                             javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)

        Lists all the tags in the system or the ones matching specific query params. For example to list all the tags in the system,

        GET /api/v1/catalog/tags 

         {
  "responseCode": 1000,
  "responseMessage": "Success",
  "entities": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "device",
      "description": "device tag",
      "timestamp": 1462865727579,
      "tagIds": []
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "thermostat",
      "description": "thermostat device",
      "timestamp": 1462866539146,
      "tagIds": [1]
    }
    ..
    ..
  ]
 }

        The tags can also be listed based on specific query params. For example to list tag(s) with the name "device",

        GET /api/v1/catalog/tags?name=device 
         {
   "responseCode": 1000,
   "responseMessage": "Success",
   "entities": [{
     "id": 1,
     "name": "device",
     "description": "device tag",
     "timestamp": 1462865727579,
     "tagIds": []
   }]
 }
        Parameters:
        uriInfo - the URI info which contains the query params
        Returns:
        the response

      • getTagById

        @GET
 @Path(value="/tags/{id}")
 @Timed
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTagById(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                         Long tagId)

        Gets a specific tag by Id. For example,

        GET /api/v1/catalog/tags/1 
         {
   "responseCode": 1000,
   "responseMessage": "Success",
   "entity": {
     "id": 1,
     "name": "device",
     "description": "device tag",
     "timestamp": 1462865727579,
     "tagIds": []
   }
 }
        Parameters:
        tagId - the tag id
        Returns:
        the response

      • addTag

        @POST
 @Path(value="/tags")
 @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addTag(TagDto tagDto)

        Creates a tag in the system. For example,

        POST /api/v1/catalog/tags 
         {
   "name": "device",
   "description": "device tag"
 }
        Sample success response: 
         {
   "responseCode": 1000,
   "responseMessage": "Success",
     "entity": {
       "id": 1,
       "name": "device",
       "description": "device tag",
       "timestamp": 1462865727579,
       "tagIds": []
     }
 }

        Tags can be optionally nested. To create a nested tag, specify a parent tag id while creating the tag. Parent tags can also be added later via the update api (PUT). For example a thermostat tag can be added as a child of device tag as follows.

        POST /api/v1/catalog/tags 

         {
   "name": "thermostat",
   "description": "thermostat device",
   "tagIds": [1]
 }
        Response: 
         {
    "responseCode": 1000,
    "responseMessage": "Success",
    "entity": {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "thermostat",
      "description": "thermostat device",
      "timestamp": 1462866539146,
      "tagIds": [1]
    }
 }
        Parameters:
        tagDto - the tag object to be created
        Returns:
        the response

      • removeTag

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/tags/{id}")
 @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeTag(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                      Long tagId)

        Removes a tag from the system. Tags cannot be removed if it has any associated entities.

        DELETE /api/v1/catalog/tags/3 
         {
   "responseCode": 1000,
   "responseMessage": "Success",
   "entity": {
     "id": 3,
     "name": "weather",
     "description": "weather related",
     "timestamp": 1462868853582,
     "tagIds": []
   }
 }

        Trying to delete a tag that has some child entities would result in an error. A tag should be first removed from all the entities (including child tags) before it can be deleted.

        DELETE /api/v1/catalog/tags/1 
         {
 "responseCode": 1102,
 "responseMessage": "An exception with message [Tag not empty, has child entities.]
   was thrown while processing request. Please check webservice/ErrorCodes.md
   for more details."
 }
        Parameters:
        tagId - the id of the tag to be deleted
        Returns:
        the response

      • addOrUpdateTag

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/tags/{id}")
 @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addOrUpdateTag(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                        Long tagId,
                                                                                        TagDto tagDto)

        Updates a tag in the system.

        PUT /api/v1/catalog/tags/1 

         {
   "name": "device",
   "description": "updated device tag"
 }
        Sample success response: 
         {
   "responseCode": 1000,
   "responseMessage": "Success",
     "entity": {
       "id": 1,
       "name": "device",
       "description": "updated device tag",
       "timestamp": 1462870576965,
       "tagIds": []
     }
 }
        Parameters:
        tagId - the id of the tag to be updated
        tagDto - the updated tag object
        Returns:
        the response

      • addTagForEntity

        @POST
 @Path(value="/tags/{id}/entities/{namespace}/{entity-id}")
 @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addTagForEntity(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                           Long tagId,
                                                                                                                           @PathParam(value="namespace")
                                                                                                                           String namespace,
                                                                                                                           @PathParam(value="entity-id")
                                                                                                                           Long entityId)

        Tags the entity with the given tag. For example,

        POST /api/v1/catalog/tags/:TAG_ID/entities/:NAME_SPACE/:ENTITY_ID Sample success response: 
         {
   "responseCode": 1000,
   "responseMessage": "Success",
 }
        Parameters:
        tagId -
        namespace -
        entityId -
        Returns:

      • removeTagFromEntity

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/tags/{id}/entities/{namespace}/{entity-id}")
 @Timed
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeTagFromEntity(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                 Long tagId,
                                                                                                                                 @PathParam(value="namespace")
                                                                                                                                 String namespace,
                                                                                                                                 @PathParam(value="entity-id")
                                                                                                                                 Long entityId)

        Removes the given tag from the entity.

        DELETE /api/v1/catalog/tags/:TAG_ID/entities/:NAME_SPACE/:ENTITY_ID 
         {
   "responseCode": 1000,
   "responseMessage": "Success",
 }

        Parameters:
        tagId -
        namespace -
        entityId -
        Returns:

      • getTaggedEntities

        @GET
 @Path(value="/tags/{id}/entities")
 @Timed
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTaggedEntities(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                         Long tagId)

        Gets all the entities tagged with the given tag id. This also recursively gets all the entities belonging to any child tags of the given tag. The child tags itself are not included in the result.

        GET /api/v1/catalog/tags/1/entities 
         {
   "responseCode":1000,
   "responseMessage":"Success",
   "entities":[{
     "id":12,
     "namespace":"tag"
     }]
 }
        Parameters:
        tagId - the tag id
        Returns:
        the response

      • getTagsForEntity

        @GET
 @Path(value="/taggedentities/{namespace}/{id}/tags")
 @Timed
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getTagsForEntity(@PathParam(value="namespace")
                                                                                                                                                          String namespace,
                                                                                                                                                          @PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                          Long entityId)

        Gets all associated tags for a given entity id.

        GET /api/v1/catalog//taggedentities/{namespace}/{id}/tags 
         {
   "responseCode":1000,
   "responseMessage":"Success",
   "entities":[{
       "id": 1,
       "name": "device",
       "description": "updated device tag",
       "timestamp": 1462870576965,
       "tagIds": []
     }]
 }
        Returns:
        the response
